title: AFK Leaver Buster
body: I have been on this Leaver Buster System because my router is going through some problems, it has been happening since December 28th 2014. I don't know what is wrong with it and my parents have been ringing the Internet Company about why it has been cutting off. I hate it because i get on The AFK Leaver Buster System when i don't leave game? please help me!  {{champion:77}}

replies.body:
Same for me. Plus i live in middle of pacific soo we have sometime bad day with deco for no reason... i actually had 10 MIN!!! 4 times!!! are you out of your mind?? I never abandon a game, or leave one by myself!

FIX this plz - why doesn't give the choice to the teammates/players for penality at the end? or just a pop up asking what's going on?

thkx

Unfortunately there's no way for the servers to distinguish between you purposefully leaving a game and being accidentally cut from it. On top of that, it wouldn't really matter, because people can also purposefully cut off their internet.
